thread.title: Business meeting held at The Goring, 12 people
thread.title_full: Business meeting held at The Goring, 12 people - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: dvillax
title: Business meeting held at The Goring, 12 people
text:
Service really perfection. Atmosphere excellent. Singles adequate, ample wardrobe space, excellent bathroom, perfect room temperature, windows can be opened.
Food good. Strong and continuous wi fi. Within 10 minutes of arriving in the Hotel you are addressed by your name. No breakfast buffet which means that if you are on a business trip and have an early start can be a problem.
Room Tip: The friendly, helpful, personal atmosphere. If you are a couple ensure room is large enough. See more room tips
